ISSUE.TITLE: Column set as string with a date format stay empty
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If a request return a value that is set as a string, but contains a date, in the table view the fields is empty. It seems to be because the value of the string is converted at some point in a Moment object. As we are using the type string to render the object, the field stays empty. I did not find where this is coming from.
